title: The Dangerous Son
description: The only person who can touch him... is her. For Spenser Ingram love is an abstract concept. Friendless and fearless, he unhappily walks his own solo path. Encouraged by his parents to wield his cold-blooded ruthlessness like a weapon, the boy who never cried grew into a man who regularly makes others weep. Sent to deliver a message to a local motorcycle club that’s standing in the way of his family’s never-ending pursuit of power, he encounters Poppy Tennyson and is immediately captivated. For the first time in his life, Spenser wants something for himself. Unfortunately, a decades-long conspiracy is playing out behind the scenes, and he’s quickly left questioning if his affection for Poppy is genuine or a carefully crafted illusion created by the one person he thought he could trust. The Dangerous Son is a dark and erotic romantic suspense novel set in a world where deception is the norm and the truth can’t be trusted. >> Book One in The Coalition series of interconnected standalones. This series can be read in any order as timelines and characters overlap << Should you prefer to read The Coalition series in release order, it is as follows: The Dangerous Son The Optional AuntThe Worthless BrotherThe Unsuitable Wife
author: Zoe  Hill
